languages.text: {n}{petname} внимательно следит за вами с высокого насеста. Черная как смоль птица почти неподвижна, словно перед вами не живое существо, а чучело или изваяние. Внезапно клюв распахивается и из него доносится искаженное, едва узнаваемое слово:{/n} "{name}".

{n}{petname} watches you intently from up above. The jet-black bird remains almost perfectly still, giving you the sense of looking at a stuffed mount or a statue instead of a living creature. Suddenly, its beak opens, and you hear a distorted, barely intelligible{/n} "{name}."
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} внимательно следит за вами с высокого насеста. Черная как смоль птица почти неподвижна, словно перед вами не живое существо, а чучело или изваяние. Внезапно клюв распахивается и из него доносится искаженное, едва узнаваемое слово:{/n} "{name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} watches you intently from up above. The jet-black bird remains almost perfectly still, making you feel like you are looking at a stuffed mount or a statue instead of a living creature. Suddenly, the raven's beak opens, and you hear a distorted, barely intelligible{/n} "{name}."

{n}{petname} watches you intently from up above. The jet-black bird remains almost perfectly still, making you feel like you are looking at a stuffed mount or a statue instead of a living creature. Suddenly, the raven's beak opens, and you hear a distorted, barely intelligible{/n} "{name}."

{n}{petname} watches you intently from up above. The jet-black bird remains almost perfectly still, giving you the sense of looking at a stuffed mount or a statue instead of a living creature. Suddenly, its beak opens, and you hear a distorted, barely intelligible{/n} "{name}."

{n}{petname} watches you intently from up above. The jet-black bird remains almost perfectly still, giving you the sense of looking at a stuffed mount or a statue instead of a living creature. Suddenly, its beak opens, and you hear a distorted, barely intelligible{/n} "{name}."

{n}{petname} watches you intently from up above. The jet-black bird remains almost perfectly still, giving you the sense of looking at a stuffed mount or a statue instead of a living creature. Suddenly, its beak opens, and you hear a distorted, barely intelligible{/n} "{name}."

{n}{petname} watches you intently from up above. The jet-black bird remains almost perfectly still, giving you the sense of looking at a stuffed mount or a statue instead of a living creature. Suddenly, its beak opens, and you hear a distorted, barely intelligible{/n} "{name}."

languages.text: {n}{petname}は高い場所からじっとあなたを見つめている。漆黒の鳥はほとんど微動だにせず、まるで生き物ではなく、はく製か彫像を見ているかのような錯覚を覚えた。突然、そのくちばしが開き、歪んだ、ほとんど判別できない声が聞こえた。{/n}「{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} watches you intently from up above. The jet-black bird remains almost perfectly still, giving you the sense of looking at a stuffed mount or a statue instead of a living creature. Suddenly, its beak opens, and you hear a distorted, barely intelligible{/n} "{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}は高い場所からじっとあなたを見つめている。漆黒の鳥はほとんど微動だにせず、まるで生き物ではなく、はく製か彫像を見ているかのような錯覚を覚えた。突然、そのくちばしが開き、歪んだ、ほとんど判別できない声が聞こえた。{/n}「{name}」

languages.text: {n}{petname} beobachtet dich aufmerksam von oben. Der tiefschwarze Vogel sitzt fast bewegungslos, und du hast den Eindruck, du hättest ein ausgestopftes Tier oder eine Statue vor dir, aber keine lebende Kreatur. Plötzlich öffnet sich der Schnabel, und du hörst verzerrt und kaum verständlich:{/n} "{name}."
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} watches you intently from up above. The jet-black bird remains almost perfectly still, giving you the sense of looking at a stuffed mount or a statue instead of a living creature. Suddenly, its beak opens, and you hear a distorted, barely intelligible{/n} "{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} beobachtet dich aufmerksam von oben. Der tiefschwarze Vogel sitzt fast bewegungslos, und du hast den Eindruck, du hättest ein ausgestopftes Tier oder eine Statue vor dir, aber keine lebende Kreatur. Plötzlich öffnet sich der Schnabel, und du hörst verzerrt und kaum verständlich:{/n} "{name}."

languages.text: {n}{petname} vous observe attentivement du haut de son perchoir. L'oiseau noir de jais se tient parfaitement immobile, vous donnant l'impression de faire face à une créature empaillée ou à une statue. Soudain, la corneille ouvre son bec et d'une voix presque inintelligible, vous interpelle :{/n} « {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} watches you intently from up above. The jet-black bird remains almost perfectly still, giving you the sense of looking at a stuffed mount or a statue instead of a living creature. Suddenly, its beak opens, and you hear a distorted, barely intelligible{/n} "{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} vous observe attentivement du haut de son perchoir. L'oiseau noir de jais se tient parfaitement immobile, vous donnant l'impression de faire face à une créature empaillée ou à une statue. Soudain, la corneille ouvre son bec et d'une voix presque inintelligible, vous interpelle :{/n} « {name}. »

languages.text: {n}{petname} te observa detenidamente desde lo alto. El ave de color negro azabache permanece casi perfectamente inmóvil, hasta el punto de que te parece estar viendo un animal disecado o una estatua en vez de una criatura viva. De repente abre el pico, y le oyes decir{/n} «{name}» con voz distorsionada y casi ininteligible.
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} watches you intently from up above. The jet-black bird remains almost perfectly still, giving you the sense of looking at a stuffed mount or a statue instead of a living creature. Suddenly, its beak opens, and you hear a distorted, barely intelligible{/n} "{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} te observa detenidamente desde lo alto. El ave de color negro azabache permanece casi perfectamente inmóvil, hasta el punto de que te parece estar viendo un animal disecado o una estatua en vez de una criatura viva. De repente abre el pico, y le oyes decir{/n} «{name}» con voz distorsionada y casi ininteligible.

languages.text: {n}{petname}专注地俯视着你。这只漆黑的渡鸦几乎完全处于静止状态，仿佛某种填充玩具或雕像一样，完全不像是有生命的东西。突然之间，它张开了嘴，发出了扭曲的、几乎无法辨认的声音。{/n}“{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} watches you intently from up above. The jet-black bird remains almost perfectly still, giving you the sense of looking at a stuffed mount or a statue instead of a living creature. Suddenly, its beak opens, and you hear a distorted, barely intelligible{/n} "{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}专注地俯视着你。这只漆黑的渡鸦几乎完全处于静止状态，仿佛某种填充玩具或雕像一样，完全不像是有生命的东西。突然之间，它张开了嘴，发出了扭曲的、几乎无法辨认的声音。{/n}“{name}。”

languages.text: {n}{petname} seni dikkatle izliyor. Kapkara kuşun neredeyse tek tüyü bile kıpırdamıyor. Bu hâliyle âdeta doldurulmuş bir hayvanı veya bir heykeli andırıyor. Aniden gagası aralanıyor ve zar zor anlaşılan o sesini duyuyorsun.{/n} "{name}."

The jet-black bird remains almost perfectly still, giving you the sense of looking at a stuffed mount or a statue instead of a living creature. Suddenly, its beak opens, and you hear a distorted, barely intelligible{/n} "{name}."
